text: Hadi Norouzi (; 22 June 1985 - 1 October 2015) was an Iranian footballer. He played as a striker and winger. He was best known for playing for Persepolis, and became the club's captain two months before his death. He also had spells with clubs Pasargad Tehran, Fajr Sepah Tehran, Gahar Zagros and Naft Tehran. Norouzi was born in Babol, Mazandaran Province. Norouzi died from a heart attack on 1 October 2015 in Tehran. He was 30. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hadi Norouzi at PersianLeague.com * Hadi Norouzi at TeamMelli.com * Category:1985 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Iran Category:Iranian footballers Category:Mazandaran Province
title: Hadi Norouzi
